data.title: Red Hat Ansible Lightspeed with IBM watsonx Code Assistant
data.meta_description: Ansible Lightspeed with watsonx Code Assistant helps teams learn, create, and maintain Ansible Automation Platform content more efficiently.
data.text:
Ansible Lightspeed with watsonx Code Assistant is a generative AI service designed by and for Ansible platform engineers and developers. It accepts natural-language prompts entered by a user and then interacts with IBM watsonx foundation models to produce code recommendations built on Ansible best practices.

Ansible Lightspeed can help you convert subject matter expertise into trusted, reliable Ansible code that scales across teams and domains. Now available with full Ansible Playbook generation, it accelerates the adoption of automation across teams by empowering more automation content creators. While it is included with an Ansible Automation Platform subscription, a free trial or purchase of IBM watsonx Code Assistant is required to fully activate the service and unlock its generative AI capabilities.

By combining generative AI and IT automation, Ansible Lightspeed with watsonx Code Assistant can help you:
